spec_data.Name: texlive-uni-wtal-lin
spec_data.Description:
The package defines a biblatex citation style based on the
standard author-year style. The citations are optimised for
linguistic studies at the Institute of Linguistics at the
Bergische Universitat Wuppertal.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 06 Aug 2017 07:45:19 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Citation style for linguistic studies at the University of Wuppertal
